movies.title: Pit Stop
movies.plot: Recovering from an ill-fated affair with a married man, Gabe finds solace in the relationship he maintains with his ex-wife and daughter. On the other side of town, Ernesto evades life at home with his current live-in ex-boyfriend by spending much of his spare time in the hospital with an ailing past love. Impervious to the monotony of their blue-collar world, they maintain an unwavering yearning for romance. The emotional isolation the two men have grown accustomed to is captured in a subtle, optimistic, poetic fashion while avoiding melodrama.

biography.bio: Bailey Bass is an actor, known for Pit Stop (2013) and A Little Bit of Heaven (2011).
biography.name: Bailey Bass

biography.bio: Marcus DeAnda is an actor, known for Pit Stop (2013), Viva (2007) and Cougar Town (2009).
biography.name: Marcus DeAnda

biography.bio: Yesenia Garcia is known for her work on Pit Stop (2013), American Crime (2015) and Bi-Definition (2008).
biography.name: Yesenia Garcia

biography.bio: Bill Heck is known for his work on The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (2014), Pit Stop (2013) and Happy Baby (2014). He has been married to Maggie Lacey since September 4, 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Bill Heck

biography.bio: Heather Kafka was born on July 7, 1972 in Austin, Texas, USA. She is an actress, known for The Texas Chainsaw Massacre (2003), Joe (2013) and Idiocracy (2006). She has been married to Darren Michael Lenton since April 6, 1996.
biography.name: Heather Kafka

biography.bio: Richard C. Jones is an American actor known for his ability to both connect to audiences as an affable everyman and create quirk-laden characters who shine in comedic roles. His route to becoming an actor actually started in broadcast journalism for which he has a Bachelor's degree. He was attracted to journalism's ability to help reveal truth and shape culture's understanding of complex issues and events. It was this same potential that exists in film and television that helped lead him to acting. He appeared in Pit Stop at the 2013 Sundance film festival, which received rave reviews and rocketed across the festival circuit. Recently, Jones has also appeared in multiple web series, national commercials and indie films. The majority of these are easily viewable on IMDB. He has also been playing the role of producer as way to help create work for he and some of his talented filmmaking friends like Matt Patterson and Rocky Conly.
biography.name: Richard C. Jones

biography.bio: Alfredo Maduro is an actor, known for Pit Stop (2013), Cuba 1961: A Love Story (2008) and Twiharder (2013).
biography.name: Alfredo Maduro

biography.bio: Jonny Mars is an actor and producer, known for Joe (2013), Black Metal (2013) and Saturday Morning Mystery (2012).
biography.name: Jonny Mars

biography.bio: John Merriman is an actor and director, known for Gretchen (2006), You Hurt My Feelings (2011) and Pit Stop (2013).
biography.name: John Merriman

biography.bio: Amy Seimetz first came to prominence producing and directing shorts and independent films. Most notably associate producing Barry Jenkins' Medicine For Melancholy which was nominated for Gotham and Independent Spirit Awards, after playing at South By Southwest and the Toronto International Film Festival. She became notable as an actress after her performance in Joe Swanberg's Alexander The Last, a Noah Baumbach produced film which premiered at SXSW. This was the first of three films she worked on under the direction of Mumblecore king Joe Swanberg, including Silver Bullets (Berlin, SXSW) and Autoerotic. She continued her streak of solid indie performances in Lawrence Levine's "Gabi On The Roof In July", Lena Dunham's Tiny Furniture (SXSW), Kentucker Audley's "Open Five", and David Robert Mitchell's Myth of the American Sleepover (Cannes). Her performance in Adam Wingard's horror thriller A Horrible Way To Die won her the Best Actress award at Fantastic Fest, the biggest genre film festival in the US. The film premiered at the Toronto International Film Festival to rave reviews. Seimetz is probably most known for her performance in the Megan Griffiths drama "The Off-Hours", which premiered at the Sundance film festival in 2011. The Hollywood Reporter singled her out as one of the breakouts of Sundance that year, alongside Brit Marling, Elizabeth Olsen, and Felicity Jones. Seimetz rounded out an all-star cast in the Tribeca Film Festival premiere Revenge For Jolly directed by Chadd Harbold. The ensemble cast included Kristen Wiig, Elijah Wood, Oscar Isaac, Garrett Dillahunt, Ryan Phillippe, Gillian Jacobs, Adam Brody and Brian Petsos. The film marked a reunion for Seimetz with her co-stars Wiig, Dilahunt, and Petsos from the Chadd Harbold short film "One Night Only". In 2012 Seimetz made her narrative feature directorial debut with her Floridian thriller Sun Don't Shine, which she also wrote, produced, and co-edited. The film premiered at the South By Southwest film festival in the Emerging Visions section to rave reviews.
biography.name: Amy Seimetz

biography.bio: Corby is known for his roles in Justified (FX), All The Way (HBO), CSI (CBS), as well as his back to back Sundance appearances in the successful independent films, Hellion and Pit Stop (Independent Spirit Award Nominee). He is classically trained, and has appeared in productions ranging from Radio City Music Hall to Dubai.
biography.name: Corby Sullivan

biography.bio: Adi is an actor, known for Pit Stop (2013).
biography.name: Adi

biography.bio: Naila Ahmed is an actress, known for Pit Stop (2013).
biography.name: Naila Ahmed

biography.bio: Justin Arnold has become a recognizable face in the film festival circuit, having been to South by Southwest with five films, including SCENES FROM THE SUBURBS, directed by Spike Jonze, and most recently LOVE AND AIR SEX with Ashley Bell, released theatrically by Tribeca Films. He can also be seen in the horror film THE FINAL, currently streaming on Netflix, the Sundance drama PIT STOP, and 5 TIME CHAMPION; winner of the Dallas International Film Festival for Best Narrative Feature. Dallas Morning News said, "Justin Arnold is a dead ringer for a young Jon Voight." 2015 was a busy year for Justin, with multiple features completed and slated for release in 2016 such as SAN PATRICIOS with Beau Bridges and Kris Kristofferson, MERCURY PLAINS starring opposite Scott Eastwood, THE PREY with Danny Trejo, and NO WAY TO LIVE with Timothy V. Murphy.
biography.name: Justin Arnold

biography.bio: Charlotte Bass is an actress, known for A Little Bit of Heaven (2011) and Pit Stop (2013).
biography.name: Charlotte Bass
